definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
words still ringing in one's ears (idiom)
toadying for personal gain/to curry favor/to study in great depth
lit. paper has become expensive in Luoyang (because everyone is making a copy of a popular story) (idiom)/fig. (of a product) to sell like hotcakes
lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
lit. to use a dog's tail as a substitute for sable fur (idiom)/fig. a worthless sequel to a masterpiece
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
